Command.CommandString: SELECT WCS_TASK.*, CMD_BillType.BillTypeName,Sys_TableState.StateDesc, WCS_TASK.Cellcode FromStation,WCS_TASK.ToCellCode ToStation,cast(substring(WCS_TASK.FromAddress,8,3) as int) FromLayer,cast(substring(WCS_TASK.ToAddress,8,3) as int) ToLayer, A1.AreaName,isnull(A2.DeviceNo,'') AisleDeviceNo,CD.ServiceName FROM WCS_TASK left join CMD_Area A1 on WCS_TASK.AreaCode=A1.AreaCode left join Vew_AisleDevice A2 on A2.AreaCode=WCS_TASK.AreaCode and A2.WarehouseCode=WCS_TASK.WarehouseCode and A2.AisleNo=WCS_TASK.AisleNo left join CMD_Device CD on CD.DeviceNo=A2.DeviceNo left join CMD_BillType On CMD_BillType.BillTypeCode=WCS_TASK.BillTypeCode left join Sys_TableState on Sys_TableState.TableName='WCS_TASK' and Sys_TableState.FieldName='State' and WCS_TASK.State=Sys_TableState.State Where {0} ORDER BY WCS_TASK.TaskLevel,WCS_TASK.RequestDate,WCS_TASK.StartDate

SELECT WCS_TASK.*, CMD_BillType.BillTypeName,Sys_TableState.StateDesc, WCS_TASK.Cellcode FromStation,WCS_TASK.ToCellCode ToStation,cast(substring(WCS_TASK.FromAddress,8,3) as int) FromLayer,cast(substring(WCS_TASK.ToAddress,8,3) as int) ToLayer, A1.AreaName,isnull(A2.DeviceNo,'') AisleDeviceNo,CD.ServiceName FROM WCS_TASK left join CMD_Area A1 on WCS_TASK.AreaCode=A1.AreaCode left join Vew_AisleDevice A2 on A2.AreaCode=WCS_TASK.AreaCode and A2.WarehouseCode=WCS_TASK.WarehouseCode and A2.AisleNo=WCS_TASK.AisleNo left join CMD_Device CD on CD.DeviceNo=A2.DeviceNo left join CMD_BillType On CMD_BillType.BillTypeCode=WCS_TASK.BillTypeCode left join Sys_TableState on Sys_TableState.TableName='WCS_TASK' and Sys_TableState.FieldName='State' and WCS_TASK.State=Sys_TableState.State Where {0} ORDER BY WCS_TASK.AlarmCode desc,WCS_TASK.State desc,WCS_TASK.TaskLevel,WCS_TASK.RequestDate,WCS_TASK.StartDate
SELECT * FROM WCS_TASK Where PalletCode=@PalletCode and ((TaskType='11' and State=0) or (TaskType='14' and State=8))
SELECT * FROM WCS_TASK Where PalletCode=@PalletCode and ((TaskType in ('12','15','14') and State=6) or (TaskType in ('11','14') and State=1) or (TaskType in ('11','16') and State=0))

select count(1) as CellCount from CMD_Cell a where ((AreaCode=@AreaCode and PalletBarCode='' and IsActive='1' and Depth=1) or (AreaCode=@AreaCode and PalletBarCode='' and IsActive='1' and Depth=2 and not exists(select 1 from CMD_Cell b where a.AreaCode=b.AreaCode and a.CellRow=b.CellRow and a.CellColumn =b.CellColumn and b.Depth=1 and PalletBarCode!='' )))
select top 1 * from WCS_TASK where AreaCode='003' and TaskType in ('11','16','14') and State in (1,2) order by RequestDate desc
update WCS_TASK set State=1,RequestDate=GETDATE(),StationNo=@StationNo,AisleNo=@AisleNo,AreaCode=@AreaCode where TaskNo=@TaskNo
Sp_CreatePalletInTask
Sp_CreateCarInTask
Sp_CreateCarOutTask
Sp_CreateTestTask
SELECT Distinct StationNo FROM CMD_Shelf Where {0} Order by StationNo

select task.*,cell.CELL_NAME,shelf.SHELF_NAME from WCS_Task task inner join CMD_WH_CELL cell on task.CellCode=cell.CELL_CODE inner join CMD_WH_SHELF shelf on cell.SHELF_CODE=shelf.SHELF_CODE where TaskTmp=1 and TaskNo=@TaskNo
Sp_ExecuteInStockTask
Sp_ExecuteInStockTask2
sp_GetCell
sp_GetCell2
sp_GetCell3
sp_GetEmptyCell
sp_GetCellByAisle
Sp_CreatePalletOutTask
Sp_CreatePalletOutTask2
Sp_CreatePalletInTask
Sp_UpdateTaskCell
Sp_UpdateTaskCellCode
Sp_UpdateMiniLoadTaskCell
sp_GetOutStockTask
select 1 from CMD_Cell where PalletBarCode=@Barcode union select 1 from WCS_TASK where State ='1' and TaskType in('11','16') and PalletCode=@Barcode
update WCS_TASK set State=@State where TaskNo=@TaskNo
update WCS_TASK set State=@State,DeviceNo=@DeviceNo,StartDate=getdate() where TaskNo=@TaskNo
update WCS_TASK set TaskAB=@TaskAB,MergeTaskNo=@MergeTaskNo where TaskNo=@TaskNo
update WCS_TASK set CarNo=@CarNo where TaskNo=@TaskNo
update WMS_BillMaster set State=@State where BillID=@BillID

SELECT CMD_Cell.CellCode, CMD_Cell.CellName, CMD_Cell.AreaCode, CMD_Area.AreaName, CMD_Cell.ShelfCode, CMD_Shelf.ShelfName, CMD_Cell.CellRow, CMD_Cell.CellColumn, CMD_Cell.IsActive, CMD_Cell.Priority, CMD_Cell.PalletCode, CMD_Cell.PalletBarcode, CMD_Cell.ProductCode, CMD_Product.ProductName, CMD_Cell.BillNo, WMS_BillMaster.BillTypeCode, CMD_BillType.BillTypeName, CMD_Cell.Quantity, CMD_Cell.IsLock, CMD_Cell.ErrorFlag, CMD_Cell.InDate, CMD_Cell.Memo FROM CMD_Cell LEFT OUTER JOIN CMD_Area ON CMD_Cell.AreaCode = CMD_Area.AreaCode LEFT OUTER JOIN CMD_Shelf ON CMD_Cell.ShelfCode = CMD_Shelf.ShelfCode LEFT OUTER JOIN WMS_BillMaster ON CMD_Cell.BillNo = WMS_BillMaster.BillID LEFT OUTER JOIN CMD_BillType ON WMS_BillMaster.BillTypeCode = CMD_BillType.BillTypeCode LEFT OUTER JOIN CMD_Product ON CMD_Cell.ProductCode = CMD_Product.ProductCode ORDER BY CMD_Cell.CellCode

SELECT CMD_Cell.*, CMD_Area.AreaName, CMD_Shelf.ShelfName, CMD_Shelf.Columns, CMD_Shelf.Rows FROM CMD_Cell LEFT OUTER JOIN CMD_Area ON CMD_Cell.AreaCode = CMD_Area.AreaCode LEFT OUTER JOIN CMD_Shelf ON CMD_Cell.ShelfCode = CMD_Shelf.ShelfCode Where {0} order by CMD_Cell.CellCode
SELECT CMD_Cell.* FROM CMD_Cell LEFT OUTER JOIN CMD_Shelf ON CMD_Cell.ShelfCode = CMD_Shelf.ShelfCode Where {0} order by CMD_Cell.CellCode
Sp_TaskProcess
Sp_UpdateTaskState
update CMD_Cell Set {0} where {1}

update CMD_Cell Set IsLock='0',PalletBarcode=Task.PalletBarcode,InDate=Task.FinishDate,BillNo=Task.TaskNo from CMD_Cell Inner Join WCS_Task Task On CMD_Cell.CellCode=Task.ToAddress where Task.TaskNo=@TaskNo

select CAST(0 as bit) as chk, ROW_NUMBER() over (order by Pallet.ProductCode) as RowID,pallet.PalletCode, pallet.ProductCode,SUM(Quantity) as Quantity, 0 as RealQty,MAX(Indate) as Indate,product.ProductName,product.ModelNo from WMS_Pallet pallet inner join CMD_Product product on pallet.ProductCode=product.ProductCode where palletcode=@PalletCode group by pallet.PalletCode,pallet.ProductCode,product.ProductName,product.ModelNo
delete from WMS_Pallet where PalletCode=@PalletCode
insert into WMS_Pallet(PalletCode,RowID,ProductCode,Quantity,InDate,IsLock,CellCode) values(@PalletCode,@RowID,@ProductCode,@Quantity,@InDate,1,@CellCode)

insert into WMS_CheckDetail(BillID, PalletCode, RowID, CellCode, TaskNo, ProductCode, Quantity, RealQty, DiffQty) values(@BillID,@PalletCode,@RowID,@CellCode,@TaskNo,@ProductCode,@Quantity,@RealQty,@DiffQty)
delete from WMS_CheckDetail where BillID=@BillID and PalletCode=@PalletCode
update WCS_TASK set Barcode=@BarCode where TaskNo=@TaskNo
update CMD_Cell set PalletBarCode=@PalletBarCode where CellCode=@CellCode

select RowID,pallet.PalletCode, pallet.ProductCode, Quantity, product.ProductName,product.ModelNo from WCS_TaskProductDetail pallet inner join CMD_Product product on pallet.ProductCode=product.ProductCode where TaskNo=@TaskNo
select AisleNo,COUNT(*) task from WCS_TASK where State!=7 and State!=8 and State!=9 and AreaCode=@AreaCode group by AisleNo order by task
select NEWID() id,taskNo,palletBarcode,'EXECUTING' status,startDate,getdate() sendDate,'ROBO_WCS' sender, deviceNo,tasker,'' field1 ,'' field2 ,'' field3 from Wcs_Task where TaskNo='{0}'
select NEWID() id,taskNo,palletBarcode,'FINISHED' status,'' errorCode,getdate() sendDate,'ROBO_WCS' sender,deviceNo,tasker,finishDate,'' field1 ,'' field2 ,'' field3 from Wcs_Task where TaskNo='{0}'

select NEWID() id,taskNo,palletBarcode,'TERMINATED' status,alarmCode errorCode,getdate() sendDate,'ROBO_WCS' sender,deviceNo,tasker,finishDate,'' field1 ,'' field2 ,'' field3 from Wcs_Task where TaskNo='{0}'

select NEWID() id,taskNo,palletBarcode,'ERROR' status,T.AlarmCode errorCode, getdate() sendDate,'ROBO_WCS' sender,T.deviceNo,tasker,finishDate,'' field1 ,'' field2 ,'' field3 from Wcs_Task T left join CMD_Device D on T.DeviceNo=D.DeviceNo and T.WarehouseCode=D.WarehouseCode where TaskNo='{0}'

select NEWID() id,taskNo,palletBarcode,'ERROR' status, T.AlarmCode errorCode, getdate() sendDate,'ROBO_WCS' sender,T.deviceNo,tasker,finishDate,'' field1 ,'' field2 ,'' field3 from Wcs_Task T left join CMD_Device D on T.DeviceNo=D.DeviceNo2 and T.WarehouseCode=D.WarehouseCode where TaskNo='{0}'

select NEWID() id,taskNo,palletBarcode,'ERROR' status, (case when D.DeviceType='01' and T.alarmCode='503' and T.TaskType='11' then '02' when D.DeviceType='01' and T.alarmCode='504' and T.TaskType='11' then '02' when D.DeviceType='01' and T.alarmCode='501' and T.TaskType='13' then '03' when D.DeviceType='01' and T.alarmCode='502' and T.TaskType='13' then '03' when D.DeviceType='01' and T.alarmCode='503' and T.TaskType='13' then '04' when D.DeviceType='01' and T.alarmCode='504' and T.TaskType='13' then '04' when D.DeviceType='01' and T.alarmCode='501' and T.TaskType='12' then '05' when D.DeviceType='01' and T.alarmCode='502' and T.TaskType='12' then '06' when D.DeviceType='02' and T.alarmCode='14' and T.TaskType='11' then '08' when D.DeviceType='02' and T.alarmCode in('11','13') and T.TaskType='12' then '09' else T.AlarmCode end) errorCode, getdate() sendDate,'ROBO_WCS' sender,T.deviceNo,tasker,finishDate,'' field1 ,'' field2 ,'' field3 from Wcs_Task T left join CMD_Device D on T.DeviceNo=D.DeviceNo and T.WarehouseCode=D.WarehouseCode where TaskNo='{0}'

select NEWID() id,taskNo,palletBarcode,'ERROR' status, (case when D.DeviceType='01' and T.alarmCode='503' and T.TaskType='11' then '02' when D.DeviceType='01' and T.alarmCode='504' and T.TaskType='11' then '02' when D.DeviceType='01' and T.alarmCode='501' and T.TaskType='13' then '03' when D.DeviceType='01' and T.alarmCode='502' and T.TaskType='13' then '03' when D.DeviceType='01' and T.alarmCode='503' and T.TaskType='13' then '04' when D.DeviceType='01' and T.alarmCode='504' and T.TaskType='13' then '04' when D.DeviceType='01' and T.alarmCode='501' and T.TaskType='12' then '05' when D.DeviceType='01' and T.alarmCode='502' and T.TaskType='12' then '06' when D.DeviceType='02' and T.alarmCode='14' and T.TaskType='11' then '08' when D.DeviceType='02' and T.alarmCode in('11','13') and T.TaskType='12' then '09' else T.AlarmCode end) errorCode, getdate() sendDate,'ROBO_WCS' sender,T.deviceNo,tasker,finishDate,'' field1 ,'' field2 ,'' field3 from Wcs_Task T left join CMD_Device D on T.DeviceNo=D.DeviceNo2 and T.WarehouseCode=D.WarehouseCode where TaskNo='{0}'
select * from WCS_TaskTemp where taskNo={0} and taskFlag!=9 order by sendDate desc
Sp_ImportWmsTask
Delete Wcs_TaskTemp
update CMD_Device set AlarmCode=@AlarmCode where DeviceNo=@DeviceNo
update WCS_Task set AlarmCode=@AlarmCode,AlarmDesc=@AlarmDesc where TaskNo=@TaskNo

update WCS_Task set State=@State,RequestDate=(case when @State=2 and RequestDate is null then getdate() else null end) where PalletBarcode=@PalletBarcode and AisleNo=@AisleNo and State in('0','1','2') and TaskType='11'
update WCS_Task set NewCellCode=isnull(@field1,''),NewAddress=isnull((select StationAddress from Vew_StationAddress where StationNo=@field1),'') where TaskNo=@TaskNo and NewCellCode=''
update WCS_Task set NewCellCode=isnull(@field1,''),NewAddress=isnull(select StationAddress from Vew_StationAddress where StationNo=@field1),'') where TaskNo=@TaskNo

update WCS_Task set StartReturnCode=(case when @Flag=1 then @ReturnCode else StartReturnCode end), AlarmReturnCode=(case when @Flag=2 then @ReturnCode else AlarmReturnCode end),FinishReturnCode=(case when @Flag in(3,5) then @ReturnCode else FinishReturnCode end) where TaskNo=@TaskNo
select AisleNo,finishdate,DeviceNo from WCS_Task where {0}
select finishdate,TaskType,datediff(S,Startdate,finishdate) time from WCS_TASK where State=7 and datediff(S,Startdate,finishdate)<500 and StartDate is not null and {0}
Insert into sys_DeviceAlarmRecord(WarehouseCode,AreaCode,DeviceNo,AlarmCode,StartDate) Values(@WarehouseCode,@AreaCode,@DeviceNo,@AlarmCode,GETDATE())
update sys_DeviceAlarmRecord set EndDate=GETDATE() where DeviceNo=@DeviceNo and AreaCode=@AreaCode and WarehouseCode=@WarehouseCode and EndDate is null

select R.*,C.AisleNo,d.AlarmDesc,DATEDIFF(SS,R.StartDate,R.EndDate) duration from Sys_DeviceAlarmRecord R left join CMD_AisleDevice C on C.DeviceNo2=R.DeviceNo left join Sys_DeviceAlarm D on D.AlarmCode=R.AlarmCode where {0}
